entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early this afternoon. Rain beginning this afternoon. Wind southeast 20 km/h except gusting to 50 near the Strait of Georgia. High 7. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending before morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Wind southeast 20 km/h except gusting to 50 near the Strait of Georgia this evening. Wind becoming light near midnight. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 60%
